thread.title: How do you spot fake news?
thread.title_full: How do you spot fake news?

title: How do you spot fake news?
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device How do you spot fake news? 21 February 2017 Last updated at 06:57 GMT Thousands of fake news stories are being shared online and sometimes it's tricky to know if the story is real or not. 
Do you think YOU could spot a fake news story? 
Well, Ricky set one school a challenge to see if the kids there can spot FAKE NEWS. 
See how they got on... Best video / audio
